name: Glassix
description: Glassix provides an AI-powered unified messaging platform for omnichannel customer communication and support.
longDescription: Glassix is an AI-driven customer communication platform designed to streamline business interactions across multiple digital channels, including email, SMS, live chat, and social media. Founded in 2015 and based in Tel Aviv, Israel, the company aims to empower businesses by enhancing customer engagement through conversational AI and omnichannel capabilities. Its mission is to broaden access to advanced automation tools, enabling businesses of all sizes to deliver seamless, personalized customer experiences. By integrating AI-powered chatbots and a unified inbox, Glassix helps organizations reduce response times, automate routine tasks, and maintain conversation continuity across channels. The platform is trusted by major brands like Nike, Avis, and Dyson, catering to industries ranging from retail to telecommunications. Glassix also offers a no-code chatbot builder, making it accessible for non-technical users to create and deploy sophisticated automation flows.
features: Unified inbox consolidates customer interactions from email, SMS, live chat, and social media into a single interface for streamlined management.
AI-powered chatbots, built with GPT-4, automate routine customer queries, reducing response times and freeing agents for complex tasks.
No-code chatbot builder allows non-technical users to create and deploy automated conversational flows across all channels with one click.
Omnichannel support ensures seamless conversation continuity across platforms like WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, and website chat widgets.
Real-time collaboration tools enable agents to co-browse with customers and digitally sign documents, enhancing issue resolution speed.
Advanced analytics provide data-driven insights into customer behavior, optimizing service delivery and personalization strategies.
Programmable agent widgets allow businesses to customize the platform to match specific workflows and brand identities.
Offline business continuity ensures customer interactions are updated automatically when agents reconnect, preventing missed opportunities.
Robust data encryption and compliance measures protect sensitive customer information, ensuring secure communications.
Visual omnichannel support enables customers to share images and videos for faster issue identification and resolution.

faqs.question: What is Glassix?
faqs.answer: Glassix is an AI-powered platform that unifies customer communications across digital channels like email, SMS, live chat, and social media, enhancing support and engagement.

faqs.question: Does Glassix offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Glassix provides a 30-day free trial, allowing businesses to test its omnichannel and AI features without a credit card.

faqs.question: What types of businesses can use Glassix?
faqs.answer: Glassix is vertical-agnostic, serving industries like retail, automotive, telecom, and government, from small businesses to large enterprises.

faqs.question: How does the no-code chatbot builder work?
faqs.answer: The no-code chatbot builder allows users to design automated conversational flows using a visual interface, deployable to all channels with one click.

faqs.question: Can Glassix integrate with existing systems?
faqs.answer: Yes, Glassix offers a full API for seamless integration with existing solutions, supporting AI bot integration, ticket management, and more.

faqs.question: How does Glassix ensure data security?
faqs.answer: Glassix employs robust data encryption and compliance measures to protect sensitive customer information across all communication channels.

faqs.question: What channels does Glassix support?
faqs.answer: Glassix supports multiple channels, including WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, SMS, email, live chat, and social media platforms like Instagram.

faqs.question: How does Glassix improve customer experience?
faqs.answer: By providing real-time responses, personalized interactions, and seamless omnichannel continuity, Glassix enhances customer satisfaction and loyalty.

faqs.question: Can Glassix handle high inquiry volumes?
faqs.answer: Yes, Glassix’s AI chatbots can manage large volumes of inquiries, allowing human agents to focus on complex issues.

faqs.question: Is technical expertise required to use Glassix?
faqs.answer: No, Glassix’s no-code tools and intuitive interface make it accessible for non-technical users to set up and manage.
